input.content:
#!/bin/bash
# NGC Docker Configuration Script for OVH Cloud L4-360 GPUs
# =========================================================
#
# Configures Docker/containerd for optimal NGC container GPU passthrough
# Optimized for Tesla L4-360 GPUs with NGC container orchestration
#
# Usage: ./ngc_docker_setup.sh
# Requirements: Run after ngc_post_install.sh, root access required

set -euo pipefail

# Configuration
SCRIPT_VERSION="1.0.0"
LOG_FILE="/var/log/ngc_docker_setup.log"
NGC_REGISTRY="nvcr.io"
DOCKER_DAEMON_CONFIG="/etc/docker/daemon.json"
CONTAINERD_CONFIG="/etc/containerd/config.toml"

# Logging function
log() {
    echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] $1" | tee -a "$LOG_FILE"
}

# Error handling
error_exit() {
    log "ERROR: $1"
    exit 1
}

log "Starting NGC Docker Configuration Script v${SCRIPT_VERSION}"
log "Target: OVH Cloud L4-360 Tesla GPUs"
log "Environment: NVIDIA GPU Cloud (NGC) containers"

# Check if running as root
if [[ $EUID -ne 0 ]]; then
   error_exit "This script must be run as root (use sudo)"
fi

# Verify prerequisites
log "Verifying prerequisites..."

# Check if NGC post-install completed
if [[ ! -f "/opt/ngc/POST_REBOOT_INSTRUCTIONS.md" ]]; then
    error_exit "NGC post-install script must be run first. Execute ngc_post_install.sh"
fi

# Check GPU access
if ! nvidia-smi > /dev/null 2>&1; then
    error_exit "NVIDIA drivers not accessible. Ensure system reboot after NGC post-install"
fi

# Check Docker installation
if ! command -v docker &> /dev/null; then
    error_exit "Docker not found. Run NGC post-install script first"
fi

# Check NVIDIA Container Toolkit
if ! command -v nvidia-container-runtime &> /dev/null; then
    error_exit "NVIDIA Container Toolkit not found. Run NGC post-install script first"
fi

log "âœ… Prerequisites verified successfully"

# Configure Docker daemon for NGC optimization
log "Configuring Docker daemon for NGC containers..."

# Create optimized Docker daemon configuration
cat > "$DOCKER_DAEMON_CONFIG" << EOF
{
  "default-runtime": "nvidia",
  "runtimes": {
    "nvidia": {
      "path": "nvidia-container-runtime",
      "runtimeArgs": []
    }
  },
  "default-address-pools": [
    {
      "base": "172.17.0.0/12",
      "size": 24
    }
  ],
  "log-driver": "json-file",
  "log-opts": {
    "max-size": "10m",
    "max-file": "5"
  },
  "storage-driver": "overlay2",
  "storage-opts": [
    "overlay2.override_kernel_check=true"
  ],
  "live-restore": true,
  "max-concurrent-downloads": 10,
  "max-concurrent-uploads": 5,
  "userland-proxy": false,
  "experimental": false,
  "metrics-addr": "127.0.0.1:9323",
  "registry-mirrors": [],
  "insecure-registries": [],
  "debug": false,
  "hosts": ["fd://", "unix:///var/run/docker.sock"],
  "default-ulimits": {
    "memlock": {
      "Hard": -1,
      "Name": "memlock",
      "Soft": -1
    },
    "stack": {
      "Hard": 67108864,
      "Name": "stack", 
      "Soft": 67108864
    }
  }
}
EOF

log "Docker daemon configuration updated"

# Configure containerd for NGC containers
log "Configuring containerd for NGC container support..."

# Generate optimized containerd configuration
containerd config default > "$CONTAINERD_CONFIG.bak"

cat > "$CONTAINERD_CONFIG" << EOF
version = 2
root = "/var/lib/containerd"
state = "/run/containerd"
plugin_dir = ""
disabled_plugins = []
required_plugins = []
oom_score = 0

[grpc]
  address = "/run/containerd/containerd.sock"
  tcp_address = ""
  tcp_tls_cert = ""
  tcp_tls_key = ""
  uid = 0
  gid = 0
  max_recv_message_size = 16777216
  max_send_message_size = 16777216

[ttrpc]
  address = ""
  uid = 0
  gid = 0

[debug]
  address = ""
  uid = 0
  gid = 0
  level = ""

[metrics]
  address = ""
  grpc_histogram = false

[cgroup]
  path = ""

[timeouts]
  "io.containerd.timeout.shim.cleanup" = "5s"
  "io.containerd.timeout.shim.load" = "5s"
  "io.containerd.timeout.shim.shutdown" = "3s"
  "io.containerd.timeout.task.state" = "2s"

[plugins]
  [plugins."io.containerd.gc.v1.scheduler"]
    pause_threshold = 0.02
    deletion_threshold = 0
    mutation_threshold = 100
    schedule_delay = "0s"
    startup_delay = "100ms"

  [plugins."io.containerd.grpc.v1.cri"]
    disable_tcp_service = true
    stream_server_address = "127.0.0.1"
    stream_server_port = "0"
    stream_idle_timeout = "4h0m0s"
    enable_selinux = false
    selinux_category_range = 1024
    sandbox_image = "k8s.gcr.io/pause:3.2"
    stats_collect_period = 10
    systemd_cgroup = false
    enable_tls_streaming = false
    max_container_log_line_size = 16384
    disable_cgroup = false
    disable_apparmor = false
    restrict_oom_score_adj = false
    max_concurrent_downloads = 3
    disable_proc_mount = false
    unset_seccomp_profile = ""
    tolerate_missing_hugetlb_controller = true
    disable_hugetlb_controller = true
    ignore_image_defined_volumes = false

    [plugins."io.containerd.grpc.v1.cri".containerd]
      snapshotter = "overlayfs"
      default_runtime_name = "nvidia"
      no_pivot = false
      disable_snapshot_annotations = true
      discard_unpacked_layers = false

      [plugins."io.containerd.grpc.v1.cri".containerd.runtimes]
        [plugins."io.containerd.grpc.v1.cri".containerd.runtimes.nvidia]
          runtime_type = "io.containerd.runc.v2"
          runtime_engine = ""
          runtime_root = ""
          privileged_without_host_devices = false
          base_runtime_spec = ""
          [plugins."io.containerd.grpc.v1.cri".containerd.runtimes.nvidia.options]
            BinaryName = "nvidia-container-runtime"

      [plugins."io.containerd.grpc.v1.cri".containerd.untrusted_workload_runtime]
        runtime_type = ""
        runtime_engine = ""
        runtime_root = ""
        privileged_without_host_devices = false
        base_runtime_spec = ""

    [plugins."io.containerd.grpc.v1.cri".cni]
      bin_dir = "/opt/cni/bin"
      conf_dir = "/etc/cni/net.d"
      max_conf_num = 1
      conf_template = ""

    [plugins."io.containerd.grpc.v1.cri".registry]
      [plugins."io.containerd.grpc.v1.cri".registry.mirrors]
        [plugins."io.containerd.grpc.v1.cri".registry.mirrors."docker.io"]
          endpoint = ["https://registry-1.docker.io"]
        [plugins."io.containerd.grpc.v1.cri".registry.mirrors."nvcr.io"]
          endpoint = ["https://nvcr.io"]

    [plugins."io.containerd.grpc.v1.cri".x509_key_pair_streaming]
      tls_cert_file = ""
      tls_private_key_file = ""

  [plugins."io.containerd.internal.v1.opt"]
    path = "/opt/containerd"

  [plugins."io.containerd.internal.v1.restart"]
    interval = "10s"

  [plugins."io.containerd.metadata.v1.bolt"]
    content_sharing_policy = "shared"

  [plugins."io.containerd.monitor.v1.cgroups"]
    no_prometheus = false

  [plugins."io.containerd.runtime.v1.linux"]
    shim = "containerd-shim"
    runtime = "runc"
    runtime_root = ""
    no_shim = false
    shim_debug = false

  [plugins."io.containerd.runtime.v2.task"]
    platforms = ["linux/amd64"]

  [plugins."io.containerd.service.v1.diff-service"]
    default = ["walking"]

  [plugins."io.containerd.snapshotter.v1.devmapper"]
    root_path = ""
    pool_name = ""
    base_image_size = ""
    async_remove = false
EOF

log "Containerd configuration updated for NGC containers"

# Create NGC-specific Docker Compose configuration
log "Creating NGC container orchestration templates..."

mkdir -p /opt/ngc/compose-templates
mkdir -p /opt/ngc/containers
mkdir -p /var/log/ngc-containers

# NGC container orchestration template
cat > /opt/ngc/compose-templates/ngc-base.yml << 'EOF'
version: '3.8'

services:
  ngc-base:
    image: ${NGC_IMAGE}
    runtime: nvidia
    environment:
      - NVIDIA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=all
      - NVIDIA_DRIVER_CAPABILITIES=compute,utility
      - CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=all
    volumes:
      - /opt/ngc/models:/workspace/models:ro
      - /opt/ngc/data:/workspace/data
      - /var/log/ngc-containers:/workspace/logs
    networks:
      - ngc-network
    deploy:
      resources:
        reservations:
          devices:
            - driver: nvidia
              count: all
              capabilities: [gpu]
    restart: unless-stopped
    logging:
      driver: "json-file"
      options:
        max-size: "10m"
        max-file: "5"

networks:
  ngc-network:
    driver: bridge
    ipam:
      config:
        - subnet: 172.20.0.0/16
EOF

# NGC vLLM container template for Qwen3 models
cat > /opt/ngc/compose-templates/qwen3-vllm.yml << 'EOF'
version: '3.8'

services:
  qwen3-moe-vllm:
    image: nvcr.io/nvidia/pytorch:23.10-py3
    runtime: nvidia
    environment:
      - NVIDIA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=0,1
      - NVIDIA_DRIVER_CAPABILITIES=compute,utility
      - CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=0,1
      - MODEL_NAME=DavidAU/Qwen3-MOE-6x1.7B-10.2B-Shining-Madness-Uncensored
      - MAX_MODEL_LEN=262144
      - TENSOR_PARALLEL_SIZE=2
      - GPU_MEMORY_UTILIZATION=0.85
      - MAX_NUM_SEQS=16
      - PORT=8001
    ports:
      - "8001:8001"
    volumes:
      - /opt/ngc/models:/workspace/models
      - /opt/ngc/data:/workspace/data
      - /var/log/ngc-containers:/workspace/logs
    command: >
      bash -c "
      pip install vllm==0.2.5 &&
      python -m vllm.entrypoints.openai.api_server
        --model $${MODEL_NAME}
        --tensor-parallel-size $${TENSOR_PARALLEL_SIZE}
        --max-model-len $${MAX_MODEL_LEN}
        --gpu-memory-utilization $${GPU_MEMORY_UTILIZATION}
        --max-num-seqs $${MAX_NUM_SEQS}
        --served-model-name qwen3-moe
        --port $${PORT}
        --trust-remote-code
      "
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:8001/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 60s
    networks:
      - ngc-network
    deploy:
      resources:
        reservations:
          devices:
            - driver: nvidia
              device_ids: ['0', '1']
              capabilities: [gpu]
    restart: unless-stopped
    logging:
      driver: "json-file"
      options:
        max-size: "50m"
        max-file: "10"

  qwen3-42b-vllm:
    image: nvcr.io/nvidia/pytorch:23.10-py3
    runtime: nvidia
    environment:
      - NVIDIA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=2,3
      - NVIDIA_DRIVER_CAPABILITIES=compute,utility
      - CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=2,3
      - MODEL_NAME=DavidAU/Qwen3-42B-Luminous-Aura-v1.5-Uncensored-GGUF
      - MAX_MODEL_LEN=131072
      - TENSOR_PARALLEL_SIZE=2
      - GPU_MEMORY_UTILIZATION=0.90
      - MAX_NUM_SEQS=12
      - PORT=8002
    ports:
      - "8002:8002"
    volumes:
      - /opt/ngc/models:/workspace/models
      - /opt/ngc/data:/workspace/data
      - /var/log/ngc-containers:/workspace/logs
    command: >
      bash -c "
      pip install vllm==0.2.5 &&
      python -m vllm.entrypoints.openai.api_server
        --model $${MODEL_NAME}
        --tensor-parallel-size $${TENSOR_PARALLEL_SIZE}
        --max-model-len $${MAX_MODEL_LEN}
        --gpu-memory-utilization $${GPU_MEMORY_UTILIZATION}
        --max-num-seqs $${MAX_NUM_SEQS}
        --served-model-name qwen3-42b
        --port $${PORT}
        --trust-remote-code
      "
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:8002/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 90s
    networks:
      - ngc-network
    deploy:
      resources:
        reservations:
          devices:
            - driver: nvidia
              device_ids: ['2', '3']
              capabilities: [gpu]
    restart: unless-stopped
    logging:
      driver: "json-file"
      options:
        max-size: "50m"
        max-file: "10"

networks:
  ngc-network:
    driver: bridge
    ipam:
      config:
        - subnet: 172.21.0.0/16

volumes:
  model-cache:
    driver: local
  data-volume:
    driver: local
EOF

# Container management scripts
log "Creating NGC container management utilities..."

# Container deployment script
cat > /opt/ngc/scripts/deploy-containers.sh << 'EOF'
#!/bin/bash
# NGC Container Deployment Script
# Deploys and manages NGC containers for Qwen3 models

set -euo pipefail

LOG_FILE="/var/log/ngc-containers/deploy.log"
COMPOSE_DIR="/opt/ngc/compose-templates"

# Logging function
log() {
    echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] $1" | tee -a "$LOG_FILE"
}

# Error handling
error_exit() {
    log "ERROR: $1"
    exit 1
}

# Function to check GPU availability
check_gpu_availability() {
    log "Checking GPU availability..."
    
    if ! nvidia-smi > /dev/null 2>&1; then
        error_exit "NVIDIA GPUs not accessible"
    fi
    
    GPU_COUNT=$(nvidia-smi --query-gpu=count --format=csv,noheader,nounits | head -1)
    log "Found ${GPU_COUNT} GPUs available"
    
    if [[ $GPU_COUNT -lt 4 ]]; then
        error_exit "Minimum 4 GPUs required for dual-model deployment"
    fi
}

# Function to pre-pull NGC images
pull_ngc_images() {
    log "Pre-pulling NGC container images..."
    
    IMAGES=(
        "nvcr.io/nvidia/pytorch:23.10-py3"
        "nvcr.io/nvidia/cuda:12.2-devel-ubuntu20.04"
    )
    
    for image in "${IMAGES[@]}"; do
        log "Pulling $image..."
        if ! docker pull "$image"; then
            error_exit "Failed to pull $image"
        fi
    done
    
    log "âœ… All NGC images pulled successfully"
}

# Function to deploy containers
deploy_containers() {
    local deployment_type=${1:-"qwen3"}
    
    log "Deploying NGC containers for: $deployment_type"
    
    case $deployment_type in
        "qwen3")
            log "Deploying Qwen3 dual-model setup..."
            cd "$COMPOSE_DIR"
            docker-compose -f qwen3-vllm.yml up -d
            ;;
        "base")
            log "Deploying NGC base environment..."
            cd "$COMPOSE_DIR"
            NGC_IMAGE="nvcr.io/nvidia/pytorch:23.10-py3" docker-compose -f ngc-base.yml up -d
            ;;
        *)
            error_exit "Unknown deployment type: $deployment_type"
            ;;
    esac
    
    log "âœ… Container deployment completed"
}

# Function to check container health
check_container_health() {
    log "Checking container health status..."
    
    # Wait for containers to start
    sleep 30
    
    CONTAINERS=$(docker ps --format "table {{.Names}}\t{{.Status}}" | grep -E "(qwen3|ngc)" || true)
    
    if [[ -z "$CONTAINERS" ]]; then
        error_exit "No NGC containers found running"
    fi
    
    log "Container Status:"
    echo "$CONTAINERS"
    
    # Check service health endpoints
    for port in 8001 8002; do
        if curl -f "http://localhost:${port}/health" > /dev/null 2>&1; then
            log "âœ… Service on port $port is healthy"
        else
            log "âš ï¸ Service on port $port not responding (may still be starting)"
        fi
    done
}

# Main execution
main() {
    local deployment_type=${1:-"qwen3"}
    
    log "Starting NGC container deployment: $deployment_type"
    
    check_gpu_availability
    pull_ngc_images
    deploy_containers "$deployment_type"
    check_container_health
    
    log "ğŸ‰ NGC container deployment completed successfully!"
    log "Services available at:"
    log "  - Qwen3-MOE: http://localhost:8001"
    log "  - Qwen3-42B: http://localhost:8002"
    log "Monitor with: docker-compose -f ${COMPOSE_DIR}/qwen3-vllm.yml logs -f"
}

# Script execution
if [[ "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}" == "${0}" ]]; then
    main "$@"
fi
EOF

chmod +x /opt/ngc/scripts/deploy-containers.sh

# Container monitoring script
cat > /opt/ngc/scripts/monitor-containers.sh << 'EOF'
#!/bin/bash
# NGC Container Monitoring Script
# Real-time monitoring of NGC container performance and GPU utilization

set -euo pipefail

LOG_FILE="/var/log/ngc-containers/monitor.log"

# Colors for output
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
BLUE='\033[0;34m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

# Logging function
log() {
    echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] $1" | tee -a "$LOG_FILE"
}

# Function to display GPU utilization
show_gpu_utilization() {
    echo -e "${BLUE}=== GPU Utilization ===${NC}"
    nvidia-smi --query-gpu=index,name,temperature.gpu,utilization.gpu,memory.used,memory.total,power.draw --format=csv,noheader,nounits | while IFS=, read -r gpu_id name temp util mem_used mem_total power; do
        mem_used=$(echo $mem_used | tr -d ' ')
        mem_total=$(echo $mem_total | tr -d ' ')
        mem_percent=$(( (mem_used * 100) / mem_total ))
        
        # Color code based on utilization
        if [[ $util -gt 80 ]]; then
            color=$RED
        elif [[ $util -gt 50 ]]; then
            color=$YELLOW
        else
            color=$GREEN
        fi
        
        echo -e "GPU ${gpu_id}: ${color}${util}%${NC} | Memory: ${mem_used}MB/${mem_total}MB (${mem_percent}%) | Temp: ${temp}Â°C | Power: ${power}W"
    done
    echo ""
}

# Function to show container statistics
show_container_stats() {
    echo -e "${BLUE}=== Container Statistics ===${NC}"
    
    # Get NGC containers
    CONTAINERS=$(docker ps --filter "name=qwen3" --format "{{.Names}}" 2>/dev/null || true)
    
    if [[ -z "$CONTAINERS" ]]; then
        echo -e "${RED}No NGC containers found running${NC}"
        return
    fi
    
    for container in $CONTAINERS; do
        echo -e "${GREEN}Container: $container${NC}"
        
        # Get container stats (one-time)
        STATS=$(docker stats --no-stream --format "table {{.CPUPerc}}\t{{.MemUsage}}\t{{.NetIO}}\t{{.BlockIO}}" "$container" 2>/dev/null | tail -1)
        echo "  Stats: $STATS"
        
        # Check health status
        HEALTH=$(docker inspect --format='{{.State.Health.Status}}' "$container" 2>/dev/null || echo "no-healthcheck")
        if [[ "$HEALTH" == "healthy" ]]; then
            echo -e "  Health: ${GREEN}${HEALTH}${NC}"
        elif [[ "$HEALTH" == "unhealthy" ]]; then
            echo -e "  Health: ${RED}${HEALTH}${NC}"
        else
            echo -e "  Health: ${YELLOW}${HEALTH}${NC}"
        fi
        
        echo ""
    done
}

# Function to show service endpoints status
check_service_endpoints() {
    echo -e "${BLUE}=== Service Endpoint Health ===${NC}"
    
    ENDPOINTS=(
        "8001:qwen3-moe"
        "8002:qwen3-42b"
    )
    
    for endpoint in "${ENDPOINTS[@]}"; do
        IFS=: read -r port name <<< "$endpoint"
        
        if curl -s -f "http://localhost:${port}/health" > /dev/null 2>&1; then
            echo -e "${name} (port ${port}): ${GREEN}âœ… Healthy${NC}"
        else
            echo -e "${name} (port ${port}): ${RED}âŒ Unhealthy${NC}"
        fi
    done
    echo ""
}

# Function to show recent container logs
show_recent_logs() {
    echo -e "${BLUE}=== Recent Container Logs (Last 5 lines) ===${NC}"
    
    CONTAINERS=$(docker ps --filter "name=qwen3" --format "{{.Names}}" 2>/dev/null || true)
    
    for container in $CONTAINERS; do
        echo -e "${GREEN}=== $container ===${NC}"
        docker logs --tail 5 "$container" 2>&1 | sed 's/^/  /'
        echo ""
    done
}

# Main monitoring loop
monitor_continuous() {
    local interval=${1:-5}
    
    echo -e "${GREEN}ğŸ” Starting continuous NGC container monitoring (${interval}s intervals)${NC}"
    echo "Press Ctrl+C to stop"
    echo ""
    
    while true; do
        clear
        echo -e "${BLUE}NGC Container Monitoring Dashboard - $(date)${NC}"
        echo "============================================="
        
        show_gpu_utilization
        show_container_stats
        check_service_endpoints
        show_recent_logs
        
        echo -e "${YELLOW}Refreshing in ${interval} seconds... (Ctrl+C to stop)${NC}"
        sleep "$interval"
    done
}

# One-time status check
show_status() {
    echo -e "${GREEN}ğŸ” NGC Container Status Report${NC}"
    echo "==============================="
    
    show_gpu_utilization
    show_container_stats
    check_service_endpoints
    
    log "Status check completed"
}

# Usage information
show_usage() {
    echo "Usage: $0 [command] [options]"
    echo ""
    echo "Commands:"
    echo "  status                 - Show one-time status report (default)"
    echo "  monitor [interval]     - Start continuous monitoring (default: 5s)"
    echo "  help                   - Show this help"
    echo ""
    echo "Examples:"
    echo "  $0                     # Show status once"
    echo "  $0 monitor            # Start monitoring with 5s intervals"
    echo "  $0 monitor 10         # Start monitoring with 10s intervals"
}

# Main execution
main() {
    local command=${1:-"status"}
    
    case $command in
        "monitor")
            local interval=${2:-5}
            monitor_continuous "$interval"
            ;;
        "status")
            show_status
            ;;
        "help"|"-h"|"--help")
            show_usage
            ;;
        *)
            echo -e "${RED}Unknown command: $command${NC}"
            show_usage
            exit 1
            ;;
    esac
}

# Script execution
if [[ "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}" == "${0}" ]]; then
    main "$@"
fi
EOF

chmod +x /opt/ngc/scripts/monitor-containers.sh

# Restart services with new configuration
log "Applying Docker and containerd configuration changes..."

# Stop services
systemctl stop docker
systemctl stop containerd

# Start containerd first
systemctl start containerd
systemctl enable containerd

# Start Docker
systemctl start docker
systemctl enable docker

# Verify service status
if ! systemctl is-active --quiet docker; then
    error_exit "Docker service failed to start"
fi

if ! systemctl is-active --quiet containerd; then
    error_exit "Containerd service failed to start"
fi

log "âœ… Docker and containerd services restarted successfully"

# Test NGC container functionality
log "Testing NGC container GPU passthrough..."

# Test basic GPU access in container
if docker run --rm --gpus all nvidia/cuda:12.2-base-ubuntu20.04 nvidia-smi > /dev/null 2>&1; then
    log "âœ… NGC container GPU passthrough test successful"
else
    error_exit "NGC container GPU passthrough test failed"
fi

# Create system monitoring integration
log "Setting up system monitoring integration..."

# Create systemd service for container monitoring
cat > /etc/systemd/system/ngc-container-monitor.service << 'EOF'
[Unit]
Description=NGC Container Monitoring Service
After=docker.service
Requires=docker.service

[Service]
Type=simple
ExecStart=/opt/ngc/scripts/monitor-containers.sh monitor 30
Restart=always
RestartSec=15
User=root
StandardOutput=append:/var/log/ngc-containers/monitor.log
StandardError=append:/var/log/ngc-containers/monitor.log

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
EOF

# Don't start monitoring service yet - wait for containers to be deployed
systemctl daemon-reload
systemctl enable ngc-container-monitor.service

log "NGC container monitoring service configured (not started yet)"

# Create container management aliases
log "Creating container management shortcuts..."

cat >> /etc/bash.bashrc << 'EOF'

# NGC Container Management Aliases
alias ngc-deploy='sudo /opt/ngc/scripts/deploy-containers.sh'
alias ngc-monitor='/opt/ngc/scripts/monitor-containers.sh'
alias ngc-logs='docker-compose -f /opt/ngc/compose-templates/qwen3-vllm.yml logs -f'
alias ngc-status='docker-compose -f /opt/ngc/compose-templates/qwen3-vllm.yml ps'
alias ngc-restart='docker-compose -f /opt/ngc/compose-templates/qwen3-vllm.yml restart'
alias ngc-stop='docker-compose -f /opt/ngc/compose-templates/qwen3-vllm.yml down'
alias gpu-status='nvidia-smi'
EOF

# Set permissions
chown -R root:root /opt/ngc/scripts
chown -R root:root /opt/ngc/compose-templates
chmod -R 755 /opt/ngc/scripts
chmod -R 644 /opt/ngc/compose-templates/*.yml

log "NGC Docker configuration completed successfully!"

# Display summary
echo ""
echo "ğŸ‰ NGC DOCKER CONFIGURATION COMPLETE!"
echo "===================================="
echo ""
echo "âœ… Docker daemon optimized for NGC containers"
echo "âœ… Containerd configured with NVIDIA runtime"
echo "âœ… NGC container orchestration templates created"
echo "âœ… Container management scripts installed"
echo "âœ… GPU passthrough functionality verified"
echo "âœ… Monitoring and logging configured"
echo ""
echo "ğŸ“‹ NEXT STEPS:"
echo "1. Deploy NGC containers: sudo ngc-deploy qwen3"
echo "2. Monitor containers: ngc-monitor"
echo "3. Check logs: ngc-logs"
echo "4. Test endpoints: curl http://localhost:8001/health"
echo ""
echo "ğŸ“ Configuration files:"
echo "  â€¢ Docker daemon: $DOCKER_DAEMON_CONFIG"
echo "  â€¢ Containerd: $CONTAINERD_CONFIG"
echo "  â€¢ Container templates: /opt/ngc/compose-templates/"
echo "  â€¢ Management scripts: /opt/ngc/scripts/"
echo ""
echo "âš ï¸  Ready to deploy Qwen3 models in NGC containers!"

exit 0

      - NVIDIA_DRIVER_CAPABILITIES=compute,utility
      - CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=0,1
      - MODEL_NAME=DavidAU/Qwen3-MOE-6x1.7B-10.2B-Shining-Madness-Uncensored
      - MAX_MODEL_LEN=262144
      - TENSOR_PARALLEL_SIZE=2
      - GPU_MEMORY_UTILIZATION=0.85
      - MAX_NUM_SEQS=16
      - PORT=8001
    ports:
      - "8001:8001"
    volumes:
      - /opt/ngc/models:/workspace/models
      - /opt/ngc/data:/workspace/data
      - /var/log/ngc-containers:/workspace/logs
    command: >
      bash -c "
      pip install vllm==0.2.5 &&
      python -m vllm.entrypoints.openai.api_server
        --model $${MODEL_NAME}
        --tensor-parallel-size $${TENSOR_PARALLEL_SIZE}
        --max-model-len $${MAX_MODEL_LEN}
        --gpu-memory-utilization $${GPU_MEMORY_UTILIZATION}
        --max-num-seqs $${MAX_NUM_SEQS}
        --served-model-name qwen3-moe
        --port $${PORT}
        --trust-remote-code
      "
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:8001/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 60s
    networks:
      - ngc-network
    deploy:
      resources:
        reservations:
          devices:
            - driver: nvidia
              device_ids: ['0', '1']
              capabilities: [gpu]
    restart: unless-stopped
    logging:
      driver: "json-file"
      options:
        max-size: "50m"
        max-file: "10"

  qwen3-42b-vllm:
    image: nvcr.io/nvidia/pytorch:23.10-py3
    runtime: nvidia
    environment:
      - NVIDIA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=2,3
      - NVIDIA_DRIVER_CAPABILITIES=compute,utility
      - CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=2,3
      - MODEL_NAME=DavidAU/Qwen3-42B-Luminous-Aura-v1.5-Uncensored-GGUF
      - MAX_MODEL_LEN=131072
      - TENSOR_PARALLEL_SIZE=2
      - GPU_MEMORY_UTILIZATION=0.90
      - MAX_NUM_SEQS=12
      - PORT=8002
    ports:
      - "8002:8002"
    volumes:
      - /opt/ngc/models:/workspace/models
      - /opt/ngc/data:/workspace/data
      - /var/log/ngc-containers:/workspace/logs
    command: >
      bash -c "
      pip install vllm==0.2.5 &&
      python -m vllm.entrypoints.openai.api_server
        --model $${MODEL_NAME}
        --tensor-parallel-size $${TENSOR_PARALLEL_SIZE}
        --max-model-len $${MAX_MODEL_LEN}
        --gpu-memory-utilization $${GPU_MEMORY_UTILIZATION}
        --max-num-seqs $${MAX_NUM_SEQS}
        --served-model-name qwen3-42b
        --port $${PORT}
        --trust-remote-code
      "
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:8002/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 90s
    networks:
      - ngc-network
    deploy:
      resources:
        reservations:
          devices:
            - driver: nvidia
              device_ids: ['2', '3']
              capabilities: [gpu]
    restart: unless-stopped
    logging:
      driver: "json-file"
      options:
        max-size: "50m"
        max-file: "10"

networks:
  ngc-network:
    driver: bridge
    ipam:
      config:
        - subnet: 172.21.0.0/16

volumes:
  model-cache:
    driver: local
  data-volume:
    driver: local
EOF

# Container management scripts
log "Creating NGC container management utilities..."

# Container deployment script
cat > /opt/ngc/scripts/deploy-containers.sh << 'EOF'
#!/bin/bash
# NGC Container Deployment Script
# Deploys and manages NGC containers for Qwen3 models

set -euo pipefail

LOG_FILE="/var/log/ngc-containers/deploy.log"
COMPOSE_DIR="/opt/ngc/compose-templates"

# Logging function
log() {
    echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] $1" | tee -a "$LOG_FILE"
}

# Error handling
error_exit() {
    log "ERROR: $1"
    exit 1
}

# Function to check GPU availability
check_gpu_availability() {
    log "Checking GPU availability..."
    
    if ! nvidia-smi > /dev/null 2>&1; then
        error_exit "NVIDIA GPUs not accessible"
    fi
    
    GPU_COUNT=$(nvidia-smi --query-gpu=count --format=csv,noheader,nounits | head -1)
    log "Found ${GPU_COUNT} GPUs available"
    
    if [[ $GPU_COUNT -lt 4 ]]; then
        error_exit "Minimum 4 GPUs required for dual-model deployment"
    fi
}

# Function to pre-pull NGC images
pull_ngc_images() {
    log "Pre-pulling NGC container images..."
    
    IMAGES=(
        "nvcr.io/nvidia/pytorch:23.10-py3"
        "nvcr.io/nvidia/cuda:12.2-devel-ubuntu20.04"
    )
    
    for image in "${IMAGES[@]}"; do
        log "Pulling $image..."
        if ! docker pull "$image"; then
            error_exit "Failed to pull $image"
        fi
    done
    
    log "âœ… All NGC images pulled successfully"
}

# Function to deploy containers
deploy_containers() {
    local deployment_type=${1:-"qwen3"}
    
    log "Deploying NGC containers for: $deployment_type"
    
    case $deployment_type in
        "qwen3")
            log "Deploying Qwen3 dual-model setup..."
            cd "$COMPOSE_DIR"
            docker-compose -f qwen3-vllm.yml up -d
            ;;
        "base")
            log "Deploying NGC base environment..."
            cd "$COMPOSE_DIR"
            NGC_IMAGE="nvcr.io/nvidia/pytorch:23.10-py3" docker-compose -f ngc-base.yml up -d
            ;;
        *)
            error_exit "Unknown deployment type: $deployment_type"
            ;;
    esac
    
    log "âœ… Container deployment completed"
}

# Function to check container health
check_container_health() {
    log "Checking container health status..."
    
    # Wait for containers to start
    sleep 30
    
    CONTAINERS=$(docker ps --format "table {{.Names}}\t{{.Status}}" | grep -E "(qwen3|ngc)" || true)
    
    if [[ -z "$CONTAINERS" ]]; then
        error_exit "No NGC containers found running"
    fi
    
    log "Container Status:"
    echo "$CONTAINERS"
    
    # Check service health endpoints
    for port in 8001 8002; do
        if curl -f "http://localhost:${port}/health" > /dev/null 2>&1; then
            log "âœ… Service on port $port is healthy"
        else
            log "âš ï¸ Service on port $port not responding (may still be starting)"
        fi
    done
}

# Main execution
main() {
    local deployment_type=${1:-"qwen3"}
    
    log "Starting NGC container deployment: $deployment_type"
    
    check_gpu_availability
    pull_ngc_images
    deploy_containers "$deployment_type"
    check_container_health
    
    log "ğŸ‰ NGC container deployment completed successfully!"
    log "Services available at:"
    log "  - Qwen3-MOE: http://localhost:8001"
    log "  - Qwen3-42B: http://localhost:8002"
    log "Monitor with: docker-compose -f ${COMPOSE_DIR}/qwen3-vllm.yml logs -f"
}

# Script execution
if [[ "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}" == "${0}" ]]; then
    main "$@"
fi
EOF

chmod +x /opt/ngc/scripts/deploy-containers.sh

# Container monitoring script
cat > /opt/ngc/scripts/monitor-containers.sh << 'EOF'
#!/bin/bash
# NGC Container Monitoring Script
# Real-time monitoring of NGC container performance and GPU utilization

set -euo pipefail

LOG_FILE="/var/log/ngc-containers/monitor.log"

# Colors for output
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
BLUE='\033[0;34m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

# Logging function
log() {
    echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] $1" | tee -a "$LOG_FILE"
}

# Function to display GPU utilization
show_gpu_utilization() {
    echo -e "${BLUE}=== GPU Utilization ===${NC}"
    nvidia-smi --query-gpu=index,name,temperature.gpu,utilization.gpu,memory.used,memory.total,power.draw --format=csv,noheader,nounits | while IFS=, read -r gpu_id name temp util mem_used mem_total power; do
        mem_used=$(echo $mem_used | tr -d ' ')
        mem_total=$(echo $mem_total | tr -d ' ')
        mem_percent=$(( (mem_used * 100) / mem_total ))
        
        # Color code based on utilization
        if [[ $util -gt 80 ]]; then
            color=$RED
        elif [[ $util -gt 50 ]]; then
            color=$YELLOW
        else
            color=$GREEN
        fi
        
        echo -e "GPU ${gpu_id}: ${color}${util}%${NC} | Memory: ${mem_used}MB/${mem_total}MB (${mem_percent}%) | Temp: ${temp}Â°C | Power: ${power}W"
    done
    echo ""
}

# Function to show container statistics
show_container_stats() {
    echo -e "${BLUE}=== Container Statistics ===${NC}"
    
    # Get NGC containers
    CONTAINERS=$(docker ps --filter "name=qwen3" --format "{{.Names}}" 2>/dev/null || true)
    
    if [[ -z "$CONTAINERS" ]]; then
        echo -e "${RED}No NGC containers found running${NC}"
        return
    fi
    
    for container in $CONTAINERS; do
        echo -e "${GREEN}Container: $container${NC}"
        
        # Get container stats (one-time)
        STATS=$(docker stats --no-stream --format "table {{.CPUPerc}}\t{{.MemUsage}}\t{{.NetIO}}\t{{.BlockIO}}" "$container" 2>/dev/null | tail -1)
        echo "  Stats: $STATS"
        
        # Check health status
        HEALTH=$(docker inspect --format='{{.State.Health.Status}}' "$container" 2>/dev/null || echo "no-healthcheck")
        if [[ "$HEALTH" == "healthy" ]]; then
            echo -e "  Health: ${GREEN}${HEALTH}${NC}"
        elif [[ "$HEALTH" == "unhealthy" ]]; then
            echo -e "  Health: ${RED}${HEALTH}${NC}"
        else
            echo -e "  Health: ${YELLOW}${HEALTH}${NC}"
        fi
        
        echo ""
    done
}

# Function to show service endpoints status
check_service_endpoints() {
    echo -e "${BLUE}=== Service Endpoint Health ===${NC}"
    
    ENDPOINTS=(
        "8001:qwen3-moe"
        "8002:qwen3-42b"
    )
    
    for endpoint in "${ENDPOINTS[@]}"; do
        IFS=: read -r port name <<< "$endpoint"
        
        if curl -s -f "http://localhost:${port}/health" > /dev/null 2>&1; then
            echo -e "${name} (port ${port}): ${GREEN}âœ… Healthy${NC}"
        else
            echo -e "${name} (port ${port}): ${RED}âŒ Unhealthy${NC}"
        fi
    done
    echo ""
}

# Function to show recent container logs
show_recent_logs() {
    echo -e "${BLUE}=== Recent Container Logs (Last 5 lines) ===${NC}"
    
    CONTAINERS=$(docker ps --filter "name=qwen3" --format "{{.Names}}" 2>/dev/null || true)
    
    for container in $CONTAINERS; do
        echo -e "${GREEN}=== $container ===${NC}"
        docker logs --tail 5 "$container" 2>&1 | sed 's/^/  /'
        echo ""
    done
}

# Main monitoring loop
monitor_continuous() {
    local interval=${1:-5}
    
    echo -e "${GREEN}ğŸ” Starting continuous NGC container monitoring (${interval}s intervals)${NC}"
    echo "Press Ctrl+C to stop"
    echo ""
    
    while true; do
        clear
        echo -e "${BLUE}NGC Container Monitoring Dashboard - $(date)${NC}"
        echo "============================================="
        
        show_gpu_utilization
        show_container_stats
        check_service_endpoints
        show_recent_logs
        
        echo -e "${YELLOW}Refreshing in ${interval} seconds... (Ctrl+C to stop)${NC}"
        sleep "$interval"
    done
}

# One-time status check
show_status() {
    echo -e "${GREEN}ğŸ” NGC Container Status Report${NC}"
    echo "==============================="
    
    show_gpu_utilization
    show_container_stats
    check_service_endpoints
    
    log "Status check completed"
}

# Usage information
show_usage() {
    echo "Usage: $0 [command] [options]"
    echo ""
    echo "Commands:"
    echo "  status                 - Show one-time status report (default)"
    echo "  monitor [interval]     - Start continuous monitoring (default: 5s)"
    echo "  help                   - Show this help"
    echo ""
    echo "Examples:"
    echo "  $0                     # Show status once"
    echo "  $0 monitor            # Start monitoring with 5s intervals"
    echo "  $0 monitor 10         # Start monitoring with 10s intervals"
}

# Main execution
main() {
    local command=${1:-"status"}
    
    case $command in
        "monitor")
            local interval=${2:-5}
            monitor_continuous "$interval"
            ;;
        "status")
            show_status
            ;;
        "help"|"-h"|"--help")
            show_usage
            ;;
        *)
            echo -e "${RED}Unknown command: $command${NC}"
            show_usage
            exit 1
            ;;
    esac
}

# Script execution
if [[ "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}" == "${0}" ]]; then
    main "$@"
fi
EOF

chmod +x /opt/ngc/scripts/monitor-containers.sh

# Restart services with new configuration
log "Applying Docker and containerd configuration changes..."

# Stop services
systemctl stop docker
systemctl stop containerd

# Start containerd first
systemctl start containerd
systemctl enable containerd

# Start Docker
systemctl start docker
systemctl enable docker

# Verify service status
if ! systemctl is-active --quiet docker; then
    error_exit "Docker service failed to start"
fi

if ! systemctl is-active --quiet containerd; then
    error_exit "Containerd service failed to start"
fi

log "âœ… Docker and containerd services restarted successfully"

# Test NGC container functionality
log "Testing NGC container GPU passthrough..."

# Test basic GPU access in container
if docker run --rm --gpus all nvidia/cuda:12.2-base-ubuntu20.04 nvidia-smi > /dev/null 2>&1; then
    log "âœ… NGC container GPU passthrough test successful"
else
    error_exit "NGC container GPU passthrough test failed"
fi

# Create system monitoring integration
log "Setting up system monitoring integration..."

# Create systemd service for container monitoring
cat > /etc/systemd/system/ngc-container-monitor.service << 'EOF'
[Unit]
Description=NGC Container Monitoring Service
After=docker.service
Requires=docker.service

[Service]
Type=simple
ExecStart=/opt/ngc/scripts/monitor-containers.sh monitor 30
Restart=always
RestartSec=15
User=root
StandardOutput=append:/var/log/ngc-containers/monitor.log
StandardError=append:/var/log/ngc-containers/monitor.log

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
EOF

# Don't start monitoring service yet - wait for containers to be deployed
systemctl daemon-reload
systemctl enable ngc-container-monitor.service

log "NGC container monitoring service configured (not started yet)"

# Create container management aliases
log "Creating container management shortcuts..."

cat >> /etc/bash.bashrc << 'EOF'

# NGC Container Management Aliases
alias ngc-deploy='sudo /opt/ngc/scripts/deploy-containers.sh'
alias ngc-monitor='/opt/ngc/scripts/monitor-containers.sh'
alias ngc-logs='docker-compose -f /opt/ngc/compose-templates/qwen3-vllm.yml logs -f'
alias ngc-status='docker-compose -f /opt/ngc/compose-templates/qwen3-vllm.yml ps'
alias ngc-restart='docker-compose -f /opt/ngc/compose-templates/qwen3-vllm.yml restart'
alias ngc-stop='docker-compose -f /opt/ngc/compose-templates/qwen3-vllm.yml down'
alias gpu-status='nvidia-smi'
EOF

# Set permissions
chown -R root:root /opt/ngc/scripts
chown -R root:root /opt/ngc/compose-templates
chmod -R 755 /opt/ngc/scripts
chmod -R 644 /opt/ngc/compose-templates/*.yml

log "NGC Docker configuration completed successfully!"

# Display summary
echo ""
echo "ğŸ‰ NGC DOCKER CONFIGURATION COMPLETE!"
echo "===================================="
echo ""
echo "âœ… Docker daemon optimized for NGC containers"
echo "âœ… Containerd configured with NVIDIA runtime"
echo "âœ… NGC container orchestration templates created"
echo "âœ… Container management scripts installed"
echo "âœ… GPU passthrough functionality verified"
echo "âœ… Monitoring and logging configured"
echo ""
echo "ğŸ“‹ NEXT STEPS:"
echo "1. Deploy NGC containers: sudo ngc-deploy qwen3"
echo "2. Monitor containers: ngc-monitor"
echo "3. Check logs: ngc-logs"
echo "4. Test endpoints: curl http://localhost:8001/health"
echo ""
echo "ğŸ“ Configuration files:"
echo "  â€¢ Docker daemon: $DOCKER_DAEMON_CONFIG"
echo "  â€¢ Containerd: $CONTAINERD_CONFIG"
echo "  â€¢ Container templates: /opt/ngc/compose-templates/"
echo "  â€¢ Management scripts: /opt/ngc/scripts/"
echo ""
echo "âš ï¸  Ready to deploy Qwen3 models in NGC containers!"

exit 0

content.text: Now let me create NGC-optimized container images specifically designed for the Qwen3 models with the 256K context window optimization we had planned:

input.content:
#!/bin/bash
# NGC-Optimized Container Builder for Qwen3 Models
# ================================================
#
# Builds production-ready NGC containers for Qwen3 models
# Optimized for OVH Cloud L4-360 GPUs with 256K context windows
#
# Usage: ./build-ngc-containers.sh [model_type]
# Requirements: Docker, NGC CLI, sufficient disk space (50GB+)

set -euo pipefail

# Configuration
SCRIPT_VERSION="1.0.0"
LOG_FILE="/var/log/ngc-container-build.log"
BUILD_DIR="/opt/ngc/builds"
CONTAINER_REGISTRY="${NGC_REGISTRY:-nvcr.io/nvidia}"
BASE_IMAGE="nvcr.io/nvidia/pytorch:23.10-py3"

# Model configurations
declare -A MODEL_CONFIGS=(
    ["qwen3-moe"]="DavidAU/Qwen3-MOE-6x1.7B-10.2B-Shining-Madness-Uncensored"
    ["qwen3-42b"]="DavidAU/Qwen3-42B-Luminous-Aura-v1.5-Uncensored-GGUF"
)

declare -A CONTEXT_CONFIGS=(
    ["qwen3-moe"]="262144"
    ["qwen3-42b"]="131072"
)

declare -A GPU_CONFIGS=(
    ["qwen3-moe"]="2"
    ["qwen3-42b"]="2"
)

declare -A MEMORY_CONFIGS=(
    ["qwen3-moe"]="0.85"
    ["qwen3-42b"]="0.90"
)

# Logging function
log() {
    echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] $1" | tee -a "$LOG_FILE"
}

# Error handling
error_exit() {
    log "ERROR: $1"
    exit 1
}

log "Starting NGC Container Builder v${SCRIPT_VERSION}"
log "Target: OVH Cloud L4-360 Tesla GPUs"
log "Models: Qwen3 with 256K context optimization"

# Check prerequisites
check_prerequisites() {
    log "Checking prerequisites..."
    
    # Check Docker
    if ! command -v docker &> /dev/null; then
        error_exit "Docker not found. Run ngc_docker_setup.sh first"
    fi
    
    # Check Docker daemon
    if ! docker info > /dev/null 2>&1; then
        error_exit "Docker daemon not running"
    fi
    
    # Check NGC CLI
    if ! command -v ngc &> /dev/null; then
        error_exit "NGC CLI not found. Run ngc_post_install.sh first"
    fi
    
    # Check disk space (minimum 50GB)
    AVAILABLE_SPACE=$(df /opt --output=avail | tail -1)
    REQUIRED_SPACE=52428800 # 50GB in KB
    
    if [[ $AVAILABLE_SPACE -lt $REQUIRED_SPACE ]]; then
        error_exit "Insufficient disk space. Required: 50GB, Available: $((AVAILABLE_SPACE/1024/1024))GB"
    fi
    
    # Create build directory
    mkdir -p "$BUILD_DIR"
    mkdir -p "$(dirname $LOG_FILE)"
    
    log "âœ… Prerequisites verified"
}

# Function to create optimized Dockerfile for Qwen3 models
create_dockerfile() {
    local model_type="$1"
    local model_name="${MODEL_CONFIGS[$model_type]}"
    local context_length="${CONTEXT_CONFIGS[$model_type]}"
    local tensor_parallel="${GPU_CONFIGS[$model_type]}"
    local gpu_memory="${MEMORY_CONFIGS[$model_type]}"
    
    log "Creating Dockerfile for $model_type..."
    
    cat > "$BUILD_DIR/Dockerfile.$model_type" << EOF
# NGC-Optimized Qwen3 Container
# Model: $model_name
# Context: ${context_length} tokens
# Target: OVH Cloud L4-360 GPUs

FROM $BASE_IMAGE

# Metadata
LABEL maintainer="NGC-OVH-Deployment"
LABEL version="1.0.0"
LABEL model="$model_type"
LABEL context-length="$context_length"
LABEL description="Production-optimized $model_type for L4-360 GPUs"

# Environment variables
ENV NVIDIA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=all
ENV NVIDIA_DRIVER_CAPABILITIES=compute,utility
ENV CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=all
ENV MODEL_NAME="$model_name"
ENV MAX_MODEL_LEN="$context_length"
ENV TENSOR_PARALLEL_SIZE="$tensor_parallel"
ENV GPU_MEMORY_UTILIZATION="$gpu_memory"
ENV PYTHONUNBUFFERED=1
ENV TOKENIZERS_PARALLELISM=true

# Set working directory
WORKDIR /workspace

# Update system and install dependencies
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y \\
    curl \\
    wget \\
    git \\
    htop \\
    nvtop \\
    vim \\
    tmux \\
    build-essential \\
    && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

# Install Python dependencies with versions optimized for L4-360
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir --upgrade pip setuptools wheel

# Install core ML stack
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir \\
    torch==2.1.0 \\
    torchvision==0.16.0 \\
    torchaudio==2.1.0 \\
    --index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu121

# Install vLLM with optimizations
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir \\
    vllm==0.2.5 \\
    transformers==4.36.2 \\
    tokenizers==0.15.0 \\
    accelerate==0.25.0 \\
    bitsandbytes==0.41.3 \\
    flash-attn==2.3.4 \\
    ninja

# Install additional optimizations
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir \\
    fastapi==0.104.1 \\
    uvicorn[standard]==0.24.0 \\
    pydantic==2.5.0 \\
    numpy==1.24.3 \\
    psutil==5.9.6 \\
    gpustat==1.1.1 \\
    prometheus-client==0.19.0

# Create directories
RUN mkdir -p /workspace/models \\
    /workspace/data \\
    /workspace/logs \\
    /workspace/scripts \\
    /workspace/configs

# Copy model configuration
COPY configs/${model_type}_config.json /workspace/configs/model_config.json

# Create startup script
RUN cat > /workspace/scripts/start_vllm.sh << 'SCRIPT_EOF'
#!/bin/bash
set -euo pipefail

# Logging
exec 1> >(tee -a /workspace/logs/vllm.log)
exec 2>&1

echo "Starting vLLM server for \$MODEL_NAME"
echo "Configuration:"
echo "  - Max Model Length: \$MAX_MODEL_LEN tokens"
echo "  - Tensor Parallel Size: \$TENSOR_PARALLEL_SIZE"
echo "  - GPU Memory Utilization: \$GPU_MEMORY_UTILIZATION"
echo "  - GPU Count: \$(nvidia-smi --query-gpu=count --format=csv,noheader,nounits)"
echo ""

# Wait for GPUs to be ready
sleep 10

# Pre-flight GPU check
nvidia-smi

# Start vLLM with optimized settings for L4-360
python -m vllm.entrypoints.openai.api_server \\
    --model "\$MODEL_NAME" \\
    --tensor-parallel-size "\$TENSOR_PARALLEL_SIZE" \\
    --max-model-len "\$MAX_MODEL_LEN" \\
    --gpu-memory-utilization "\$GPU_MEMORY_UTILIZATION" \\
    --max-num-seqs \${MAX_NUM_SEQS:-16} \\
    --served-model-name "${model_type}" \\
    --port \${PORT:-8000} \\
    --host 0.0.0.0 \\
    --trust-remote-code \\
    --disable-log-requests \\
    --max-log-len 2048 \\
    --max-paddings 512 \\
    --enable-chunked-prefill \\
    --max-num-batched-tokens \$((MAX_MODEL_LEN * 4))
SCRIPT_EOF

RUN chmod +x /workspace/scripts/start_vllm.sh

# Create health check script
RUN cat > /workspace/scripts/health_check.py << 'HEALTH_EOF'
#!/usr/bin/env python3
import requests
import sys
import os
import time

def check_health():
    port = os.getenv('PORT', '8000')
    max_retries = 30
    retry_delay = 10
    
    for attempt in range(max_retries):
        try:
            response = requests.get(f'http://localhost:{port}/health', timeout=5)
            if response.status_code == 200:
                print(f"âœ… Service healthy on port {port}")
                return True
        except requests.RequestException as e:
            print(f"Health check attempt {attempt + 1}/{max_retries} failed: {e}")
        
        if attempt < max_retries - 1:
            time.sleep(retry_delay)
    
    print(f"âŒ Service unhealthy after {max_retries} attempts")
    return False

if __name__ == "__main__":
    success = check_health()
    sys.exit(0 if success else 1)
HEALTH_EOF

RUN chmod +x /workspace/scripts/health_check.py

# Create monitoring script
RUN cat > /workspace/scripts/monitor.py << 'MONITOR_EOF'
#!/usr/bin/env python3
import psutil
import GPUtil
import time
import json
import os
from datetime import datetime

def collect_metrics():
    """Collect system and GPU metrics"""
    
    # GPU metrics
    gpus = GPUtil.getGPUs()
    gpu_metrics = []
    for gpu in gpus:
        gpu_metrics.append({
            'id': gpu.id,
            'name': gpu.name,
            'temperature': gpu.temperature,
            'utilization': gpu.load * 100,
            'memory_used': gpu.memoryUsed,
            'memory_total': gpu.memoryTotal,
            'memory_percent': gpu.memoryUtil * 100
        })
    
    # System metrics
    system_metrics = {
        'cpu_percent': psutil.cpu_percent(),
        'memory_percent': psutil.virtual_memory().percent,
        'disk_percent': psutil.disk_usage('/').percent,
        'timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat()
    }
    
    return {
        'system': system_metrics,
        'gpus': gpu_metrics
    }

def main():
    log_file = '/workspace/logs/metrics.json'
    
    while True:
        try:
            metrics = collect_metrics()
            
            # Append to log file
            with open(log_file, 'a') as f:
                json.dump(metrics, f)
                f.write('\\n')
            
            time.sleep(30)  # Collect metrics every 30 seconds
            
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"Error collecting metrics: {e}")
            time.sleep(30)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
MONITOR_EOF

RUN chmod +x /workspace/scripts/monitor.py

# Set environment defaults
ENV PORT=8000
ENV MAX_NUM_SEQS=16

# Health check configuration
HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=10s --start-period=120s --retries=3 \\
    CMD python /workspace/scripts/health_check.py

# Expose port
EXPOSE 8000

# Set entrypoint
ENTRYPOINT ["/workspace/scripts/start_vllm.sh"]
EOF
    
    log "âœ… Dockerfile created for $model_type"
}

# Function to create model-specific configuration files
create_model_config() {
    local model_type="$1"
    local model_name="${MODEL_CONFIGS[$model_type]}"
    local context_length="${CONTEXT_CONFIGS[$model_type]}"
    local tensor_parallel="${GPU_CONFIGS[$model_type]}"
    local gpu_memory="${MEMORY_CONFIGS[$model_type]}"
    
    log "Creating model configuration for $model_type..."
    
    mkdir -p "$BUILD_DIR/configs"
    
    cat > "$BUILD_DIR/configs/${model_type}_config.json" << EOF
{
    "model_info": {
        "name": "$model_name",
        "type": "$model_type",
        "version": "1.0.0",
        "description": "NGC-optimized configuration for $model_type on L4-360 GPUs"
    },
    "model_config": {
        "max_model_len": $context_length,
        "tensor_parallel_size": $tensor_parallel,
        "gpu_memory_utilization": $gpu_memory,
        "max_num_seqs": 16,
        "context_window": $context_length,
        "trust_remote_code": true
    },
    "hardware_optimization": {
        "target_gpu": "Tesla L4-360",
        "gpu_count": $tensor_parallel,
        "memory_per_gpu": "24GB",
        "cuda_version": "12.2",
        "optimization_level": "production"
    },
    "performance_tuning": {
        "enable_chunked_prefill": true,
        "max_paddings": 512,
        "max_log_len": 2048,
        "disable_log_requests": true,
        "max_num_batched_tokens": $(($context_length * 4))
    },
    "monitoring": {
        "health_check_port": 8000,
        "metrics_collection": true,
        "logging_level": "INFO",
        "log_rotation": true
    }
}
EOF
    
    log "âœ… Configuration created for $model_type"
}

# Function to build container image
build_container() {
    local model_type="$1"
    local image_tag="ngc-qwen3-${model_type}:latest"
    
    log "Building container image for $model_type..."
    
    cd "$BUILD_DIR"
    
    # Build with buildkit for better caching and performance
    DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 docker build \
        --file "Dockerfile.$model_type" \
        --tag "$image_tag" \
        --build-arg BUILDKIT_INLINE_CACHE=1 \
        --progress=plain \
        . 2>&1 | tee -a "$LOG_FILE"
    
    if [[ $? -eq 0 ]]; then
        log "âœ… Container image built successfully: $image_tag"
        
        # Get image size
        IMAGE_SIZE=$(docker images --format "table {{.Size}}" "$image_tag" | tail -1)
        log "Image size: $IMAGE_SIZE"
        
        return 0
    else
        error_exit "Failed to build container image for $model_type"
    fi
}

# Function to test container functionality
test_container() {
    local model_type="$1"
    local image_tag="ngc-qwen3-${model_type}:latest"
    local test_port="$((8000 + $(echo $model_type | tail -c 2 | od -An -N1 -tu1)))"
    
    log "Testing container functionality for $model_type..."
    
    # Run container in detached mode for testing
    CONTAINER_ID=$(docker run -d \
        --gpus all \
        --name "test-$model_type" \
        -p "$test_port:8000" \
        -e MAX_NUM_SEQS=4 \
        -e MODEL_NAME="${MODEL_CONFIGS[$model_type]}" \
        "$image_tag")
    
    log "Started test container: $CONTAINER_ID"
    
    # Wait for container to start
    log "Waiting for container to initialize..."
    sleep 60
    
    # Check if container is running
    if ! docker ps --filter "id=$CONTAINER_ID" --format "{{.Status}}" | grep -q "Up"; then
        log "âŒ Container failed to start. Checking logs..."
        docker logs "$CONTAINER_ID"
        docker rm -f "$CONTAINER_ID" || true
        return 1
    fi
    
    # Test health endpoint
    local max_wait=300  # 5 minutes
    local wait_time=0
    local health_ok=false
    
    while [[ $wait_time -lt $max_wait ]]; do
        if curl -s -f "http://localhost:$test_port/health" > /dev/null 2>&1; then
            log "âœ… Health endpoint responding"
            health_ok=true
            break
        fi
        
        sleep 10
        wait_time=$((wait_time + 10))
        log "Waiting for health endpoint... (${wait_time}s / ${max_wait}s)"
    done
    
    if [[ "$health_ok" != "true" ]]; then
        log "âŒ Health endpoint not responding after ${max_wait}s"
        docker logs --tail 50 "$CONTAINER_ID"
        docker rm -f "$CONTAINER_ID" || true
        return 1
    fi
    
    # Test basic model info endpoint
    if curl -s "http://localhost:$test_port/v1/models" | jq -e '.data[0].id' > /dev/null 2>&1; then
        log "âœ… Model endpoint responding"
    else
        log "âš ï¸ Model endpoint not fully ready (may need more time)"
    fi
    
    # Cleanup test container
    log "Cleaning up test container..."
    docker rm -f "$CONTAINER_ID" || true
    
    log "âœ… Container test completed for $model_type"
    return 0
}

# Function to create deployment manifests
create_deployment_manifests() {
    local model_type="$1"
    local image_tag="ngc-qwen3-${model_type}:latest"
    
    log "Creating deployment manifests for $model_type..."
    
    mkdir -p "$BUILD_DIR/manifests"
    
    # Create Docker Compose manifest
    cat > "$BUILD_DIR/manifests/${model_type}-compose.yml" << EOF
version: '3.8'

services:
  ${model_type}:
    image: $image_tag
    container_name: ngc-${model_type}
    restart: unless-stopped
    runtime: nvidia
    environment:
      - NVIDIA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=all
      - NVIDIA_DRIVER_CAPABILITIES=compute,utility
      - CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=all
      - MODEL_NAME=${MODEL_CONFIGS[$model_type]}
      - MAX_MODEL_LEN=${CONTEXT_CONFIGS[$model_type]}
      - TENSOR_PARALLEL_SIZE=${GPU_CONFIGS[$model_type]}
      - GPU_MEMORY_UTILIZATION=${MEMORY_CONFIGS[$model_type]}
      - PORT=8000
      - MAX_NUM_SEQS=16
    ports:
      - "8000:8000"
    volumes:
      - model-cache:/workspace/models
      - ${model_type}-logs:/workspace/logs
      - ${model_type}-data:/workspace/data
    networks:
      - ngc-network
    deploy:
      resources:
        reservations:
          devices:
            - driver: nvidia
              count: ${GPU_CONFIGS[$model_type]}
              capabilities: [gpu]
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "python", "/workspace/scripts/health_check.py"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 120s
    logging:
      driver: "json-file"
      options:
        max-size: "50m"
        max-file: "10"

networks:
  ngc-network:
    external: true

volumes:
  model-cache:
    driver: local
  ${model_type}-logs:
    driver: local
  ${model_type}-data:
    driver: local
EOF
    
    # Create systemd service file
    cat > "$BUILD_DIR/manifests/${model_type}.service" << EOF
[Unit]
Description=NGC ${model_type} Container Service
After=docker.service
Requires=docker.service
StartLimitIntervalSec=0

[Service]
Type=simple
Restart=always
RestartSec=30
User=root
ExecStartPre=/bin/bash -c 'docker network create ngc-network || true'
ExecStart=/usr/bin/docker-compose -f ${BUILD_DIR}/manifests/${model_type}-compose.yml up
ExecStop=/usr/bin/docker-compose -f ${BUILD_DIR}/manifests/${model_type}-compose.yml down
TimeoutStartSec=600
TimeoutStopSec=120

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
EOF
    
    log "âœ… Deployment manifests created for $model_type"
}

# Main build function
build_model_container() {
    local model_type="$1"
    
    log "Building NGC container for $model_type..."
    
    # Validate model type
    if [[ ! -v "MODEL_CONFIGS[$model_type]" ]]; then
        error_exit "Unknown model type: $model_type. Available: ${!MODEL_CONFIGS[*]}"
    fi
    
    # Create build files
    create_model_config "$model_type"
    create_dockerfile "$model_type"
    
    # Build container
    build_container "$model_type"
    
    # Test container
    if ! test_container "$model_type"; then
        error_exit "Container test failed for $model_type"
    fi
    
    # Create deployment files
    create_deployment_manifests "$model_type"
    
    log "âœ… NGC container build completed for $model_type"
}

# Function to build all containers
build_all_containers() {
    log "Building all NGC containers..."
    
    for model_type in "${!MODEL_CONFIGS[@]}"; do
        log "Starting build for $model_type..."
        build_model_container "$model_type"
        log "Completed build for $model_type"
        echo ""
    done
    
    log "âœ… All NGC containers built successfully"
}

# Function to show usage
show_usage() {
    echo "Usage: $0 [model_type|all]"
    echo ""
    echo "Available model types:"
    for model_type in "${!MODEL_CONFIGS[@]}"; do
        echo "  $model_type - ${MODEL_CONFIGS[$model_type]}"
    done
    echo "  all - Build all model containers"
    echo ""
    echo "Examples:"
    echo "  $0 qwen3-moe     # Build only Qwen3-MOE container"
    echo "  $0 qwen3-42b     # Build only Qwen3-42B container"
    echo "  $0 all           # Build all containers"
}

# Main execution
main() {
    local model_type="${1:-}"
    
    if [[ -z "$model_type" ]]; then
        show_usage
        exit 1
    fi
    
    log "NGC Container Builder started"
    
    check_prerequisites
    
    case "$model_type" in
        "all")
            build_all_containers
            ;;
        *)
            build_model_container "$model_type"
            ;;
    esac
    
    # Display summary
    echo ""
    echo "ğŸ‰ NGC CONTAINER BUILD COMPLETE!"
    echo "==============================="
    echo ""
    echo "Built containers:"
    docker images --filter "reference=ngc-qwen3-*" --format "table {{.Repository}}\t{{.Tag}}\t{{.Size}}\t{{.CreatedAt}}"
    echo ""
    echo "ğŸ“‹ DEPLOYMENT OPTIONS:"
    echo "1. Docker Compose: docker-compose -f $BUILD_DIR/manifests/MODEL-compose.yml up -d"
    echo "2. Direct Docker: docker run --gpus all -p 8000:8000 ngc-qwen3-MODEL:latest"
    echo "3. Systemd Service: Install service files from $BUILD_DIR/manifests/"
    echo ""
    echo "ğŸ“ Build artifacts:"
    echo "  â€¢ Dockerfiles: $BUILD_DIR/Dockerfile.*"
    echo "  â€¢ Configurations: $BUILD_DIR/configs/"
    echo "  â€¢ Manifests: $BUILD_DIR/manifests/"
    echo "  â€¢ Build logs: $LOG_FILE"
    echo ""
    echo "âœ… Ready for production deployment!"
}

# Script execution
if [[ "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}" == "${0}" ]]; then
    main "$@"
fi

#!/bin/bash
# NGC-Optimized Container Builder for Qwen3 Models
# ================================================
#
# Builds production-ready NGC containers for Qwen3 models
# Optimized for OVH Cloud L4-360 GPUs with 256K context windows
#
# Usage: ./build-ngc-containers.sh [model_type]
# Requirements: Docker, NGC CLI, sufficient disk space (50GB+)

set -euo pipefail

# Configuration
SCRIPT_VERSION="1.0.0"
LOG_FILE="/var/log/ngc-container-build.log"
BUILD_DIR="/opt/ngc/builds"
CONTAINER_REGISTRY="${NGC_REGISTRY:-nvcr.io/nvidia}"
BASE_IMAGE="nvcr.io/nvidia/pytorch:23.10-py3"

# Model configurations
declare -A MODEL_CONFIGS=(
    ["qwen3-moe"]="DavidAU/Qwen3-MOE-6x1.7B-10.2B-Shining-Madness-Uncensored"
    ["qwen3-42b"]="DavidAU/Qwen3-42B-Luminous-Aura-v1.5-Uncensored-GGUF"
)

declare -A CONTEXT_CONFIGS=(
    ["qwen3-moe"]="262144"
    ["qwen3-42b"]="131072"
)

declare -A GPU_CONFIGS=(
    ["qwen3-moe"]="2"
    ["qwen3-42b"]="2"
)

declare -A MEMORY_CONFIGS=(
    ["qwen3-moe"]="0.85"
    ["qwen3-42b"]="0.90"
)

# Logging function
log() {
    echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] $1" | tee -a "$LOG_FILE"
}

# Error handling
error_exit() {
    log "ERROR: $1"
    exit 1
}

log "Starting NGC Container Builder v${SCRIPT_VERSION}"
log "Target: OVH Cloud L4-360 Tesla GPUs"
log "Models: Qwen3 with 256K context optimization"

# Check prerequisites
check_prerequisites() {
    log "Checking prerequisites..."
    
    # Check Docker
    if ! command -v docker &> /dev/null; then
        error_exit "Docker not found. Run ngc_docker_setup.sh first"
    fi
    
    # Check Docker daemon
    if ! docker info > /dev/null 2>&1; then
        error_exit "Docker daemon not running"
    fi
    
    # Check NGC CLI
    if ! command -v ngc &> /dev/null; then
        error_exit "NGC CLI not found. Run ngc_post_install.sh first"
    fi
    
    # Check disk space (minimum 50GB)
    AVAILABLE_SPACE=$(df /opt --output=avail | tail -1)
    REQUIRED_SPACE=52428800 # 50GB in KB
    
    if [[ $AVAILABLE_SPACE -lt $REQUIRED_SPACE ]]; then
        error_exit "Insufficient disk space. Required: 50GB, Available: $((AVAILABLE_SPACE/1024/1024))GB"
    fi
    
    # Create build directory
    mkdir -p "$BUILD_DIR"
    mkdir -p "$(dirname $LOG_FILE)"
    
    log "âœ… Prerequisites verified"
}

# Function to create optimized Dockerfile for Qwen3 models
create_dockerfile() {
    local model_type="$1"
    local model_name="${MODEL_CONFIGS[$model_type]}"
    local context_length="${CONTEXT_CONFIGS[$model_type]}"
    local tensor_parallel="${GPU_CONFIGS[$model_type]}"

# Target: OVH Cloud L4-360 GPUs

FROM $BASE_IMAGE

# Metadata
LABEL maintainer="NGC-OVH-Deployment"

LABEL context-length="$context_length"
LABEL description="Production-optimized $model_type for L4-360 GPUs"

# Environment variables
ENV NVIDIA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=all
ENV NVIDIA_DRIVER_CAPABILITIES=compute,utility
ENV CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=all
ENV MODEL_NAME="$model_name"
ENV MAX_MODEL_LEN="$context_length"
ENV TENSOR_PARALLEL_SIZE="$tensor_parallel"
ENV GPU_MEMORY_UTILIZATION="$gpu_memory"
ENV PYTHONUNBUFFERED=1
ENV TOKENIZERS_PARALLELISM=true

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y \\
    curl \\

RUN pip install --no-cache-dir \\
    vllm==0.2.5 \\

    flash-attn==2.3.4 \\

# Install additional optimizations
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir \\
    fastapi==0.104.1 \\
    uvicorn[standard]==0.24.0 \\
    pydantic==2.5.0 \\
    numpy==1.24.3 \\
    psutil==5.9.6 \\
    gpustat==1.1.1 \\
    prometheus-client==0.19.0

# Create directories
RUN mkdir -p /workspace/models \\
    /workspace/data \\

# Copy model configuration
COPY configs/${model_type}_config.json /workspace/configs/model_config.json

# Create startup script

#!/bin/bash
set -euo pipefail

# Logging
exec 1> >(tee -a /workspace/logs/vllm.log)

echo "Starting vLLM server for \$MODEL_NAME"

echo "  - Tensor Parallel Size: \$TENSOR_PARALLEL_SIZE"
echo "  - GPU Memory Utilization: \$GPU_MEMORY_UTILIZATION"
echo "  - GPU Count: \$(nvidia-smi --query-gpu=count --format=csv,noheader,nounits)"

# Wait for GPUs to be ready

nvidia-smi

# Start vLLM with optimized settings for L4-360
python -m vllm.entrypoints.openai.api_server \\
    --model "\$MODEL_NAME" \\
    --tensor-parallel-size "\$TENSOR_PARALLEL_SIZE" \\
    --max-model-len "\$MAX_MODEL_LEN" \\
    --gpu-memory-utilization "\$GPU_MEMORY_UTILIZATION" \\
    --max-num-seqs \${MAX_NUM_SEQS:-16} \\
    --served-model-name "${model_type}" \\
    --port \${PORT:-8000} \\
    --host 0.0.0.0 \\
    --trust-remote-code \\
    --disable-log-requests \\
    --max-log-len 2048 \\
    --max-paddings 512 \\
    --enable-chunked-prefill \\
    --max-num-batched-tokens \$((MAX_MODEL_LEN * 4))
SCRIPT_EOF

RUN chmod +x /workspace/scripts/start_vllm.sh

# Create health check script
RUN cat > /workspace/scripts/health_check.py << 'HEALTH_EOF'
#!/usr/bin/env python3

    port = os.getenv('PORT', '8000')

    for attempt in range(max_retries):
        try:
            response = requests.get(f'http://localhost:{port}/health', timeout=5)
            if response.status_code == 200:
                print(f"âœ… Service healthy on port {port}")
                return True
        except requests.RequestException as e:
            print(f"Health check attempt {attempt + 1}/{max_retries} failed: {e}")
        
        if attempt < max_retries - 1:

    print(f"âŒ Service unhealthy after {max_retries} attempts")
    return False

if __name__ == "__main__":

    sys.exit(0 if success else 1)
HEALTH_EOF

# Create monitoring script

#!/usr/bin/env python3

                json.dump(metrics, f)
                f.write('\\n')
            
            time.sleep(30)  # Collect metrics every 30 seconds
            
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"Error collecting metrics: {e}")
            time.sleep(30)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
MONITOR_EOF

RUN chmod +x /workspace/scripts/monitor.py

# Set environment defaults
ENV PORT=8000
ENV MAX_NUM_SEQS=16

# Health check configuration
HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=10s --start-period=120s --retries=3 \\
    CMD python /workspace/scripts/health_check.py

# Expose port
EXPOSE 8000

# Set entrypoint
ENTRYPOINT ["/workspace/scripts/start_vllm.sh"]
EOF
    
    log "âœ… Dockerfile created for $model_type"
}

# Function to create model-specific configuration files
create_model_config() {
    local model_type="$1"
    local model_name="${MODEL_CONFIGS[$model_type]}"
    local context_length="${CONTEXT_CONFIGS[$model_type]}"
    local tensor_parallel="${GPU_CONFIGS[$model_type]}"
    local gpu_memory="${MEMORY_CONFIGS[$model_type]}"
    
    log "Creating model configuration for $model_type..."
    
    mkdir -p "$BUILD_DIR/configs"
    
    cat > "$BUILD_DIR/configs/${model_type}_config.json" << EOF
{
    "model_info": {
        "name": "$model_name",
        "type": "$model_type",
        "version": "1.0.0",
        "description": "NGC-optimized configuration for $model_type on L4-360 GPUs"
    },
    "model_config": {
        "max_model_len": $context_length,
        "tensor_parallel_size": $tensor_parallel,
        "gpu_memory_utilization": $gpu_memory,
        "max_num_seqs": 16,
        "context_window": $context_length,
        "trust_remote_code": true
    },
    "hardware_optimization": {
        "target_gpu": "Tesla L4-360",
        "gpu_count": $tensor_parallel,
        "memory_per_gpu": "24GB",
        "cuda_version": "12.2",
        "optimization_level": "production"
    },
    "performance_tuning": {
        "enable_chunked_prefill": true,
        "max_paddings": 512,
        "max_log_len": 2048,
        "disable_log_requests": true,
        "max_num_batched_tokens": $(($context_length * 4))
    },
    "monitoring": {
        "health_check_port": 8000,
        "metrics_collection": true,
        "logging_level": "INFO",
        "log_rotation": true
    }
}
EOF
    
    log "âœ… Configuration created for $model_type"
}

# Function to build container image
build_container() {
    local model_type="$1"
    local image_tag="ngc-qwen3-${model_type}:latest"
    
    log "Building container image for $model_type..."
    
    cd "$BUILD_DIR"
    
    # Build with buildkit for better caching and performance
    DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 docker build \
        --file "Dockerfile.$model_type" \
        --tag "$image_tag" \
        --build-arg BUILDKIT_INLINE_CACHE=1 \
        --progress=plain \
        . 2>&1 | tee -a "$LOG_FILE"
    
    if [[ $? -eq 0 ]]; then
        log "âœ… Container image built successfully: $image_tag"
        
        # Get image size
        IMAGE_SIZE=$(docker images --format "table {{.Size}}" "$image_tag" | tail -1)
        log "Image size: $IMAGE_SIZE"
        
        return 0
    else
        error_exit "Failed to build container image for $model_type"
    fi
}

# Function to test container functionality
test_container() {
    local model_type="$1"
    local image_tag="ngc-qwen3-${model_type}:latest"
    local test_port="$((8000 + $(echo $model_type | tail -c 2 | od -An -N1 -tu1)))"
    
    log "Testing container functionality for $model_type..."
    
    # Run container in detached mode for testing
    CONTAINER_ID=$(docker run -d \
        --gpus all \
        --name "test-$model_type" \
        -p "$test_port:8000" \
        -e MAX_NUM_SEQS=4 \
        -e MODEL_NAME="${MODEL_CONFIGS[$model_type]}" \
        "$image_tag")
    
    log "Started test container: $CONTAINER_ID"
    
    # Wait for container to start
    log "Waiting for container to initialize..."
    sleep 60
    
    # Check if container is running
    if ! docker ps --filter "id=$CONTAINER_ID" --format "{{.Status}}" | grep -q "Up"; then
        log "âŒ Container failed to start. Checking logs..."
        docker logs "$CONTAINER_ID"
        docker rm -f "$CONTAINER_ID" || true
        return 1
    fi
    
    # Test health endpoint
    local max_wait=300  # 5 minutes
    local wait_time=0
    local health_ok=false
    
    while [[ $wait_time -lt $max_wait ]]; do
        if curl -s -f "http://localhost:$test_port/health" > /dev/null 2>&1; then
            log "âœ… Health endpoint responding"
            health_ok=true
            break
        fi
        
        sleep 10
        wait_time=$((wait_time + 10))
        log "Waiting for health endpoint... (${wait_time}s / ${max_wait}s)"
    done
    
    if [[ "$health_ok" != "true" ]]; then
        log "âŒ Health endpoint not responding after ${max_wait}s"
        docker logs --tail 50 "$CONTAINER_ID"
        docker rm -f "$CONTAINER_ID" || true
        return 1
    fi
    
    # Test basic model info endpoint
    if curl -s "http://localhost:$test_port/v1/models" | jq -e '.data[0].id' > /dev/null 2>&1; then
        log "âœ… Model endpoint responding"
    else
        log "âš ï¸ Model endpoint not fully ready (may need more time)"
    fi
    
    # Cleanup test container
    log "Cleaning up test container..."
    docker rm -f "$CONTAINER_ID" || true
    
    log "âœ… Container test completed for $model_type"
    return 0
}

# Function to create deployment manifests
create_deployment_manifests() {
    local model_type="$1"
    local image_tag="ngc-qwen3-${model_type}:latest"
    
    log "Creating deployment manifests for $model_type..."
    
    mkdir -p "$BUILD_DIR/manifests"
    
    # Create Docker Compose manifest
    cat > "$BUILD_DIR/manifests/${model_type}-compose.yml" << EOF
version: '3.8'

services:
  ${model_type}:
    image: $image_tag
    container_name: ngc-${model_type}
    restart: unless-stopped
    runtime: nvidia
    environment:
      - NVIDIA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=all
      - NVIDIA_DRIVER_CAPABILITIES=compute,utility
      - CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=all
      - MODEL_NAME=${MODEL_CONFIGS[$model_type]}
      - MAX_MODEL_LEN=${CONTEXT_CONFIGS[$model_type]}
      - TENSOR_PARALLEL_SIZE=${GPU_CONFIGS[$model_type]}
      - GPU_MEMORY_UTILIZATION=${MEMORY_CONFIGS[$model_type]}
      - PORT=8000
      - MAX_NUM_SEQS=16
    ports:
      - "8000:8000"
    volumes:
      - model-cache:/workspace/models
      - ${model_type}-logs:/workspace/logs
      - ${model_type}-data:/workspace/data
    networks:
      - ngc-network
    deploy:
      resources:
        reservations:
          devices:
            - driver: nvidia
              count: ${GPU_CONFIGS[$model_type]}
              capabilities: [gpu]
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "python", "/workspace/scripts/health_check.py"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 120s
    logging:
      driver: "json-file"
      options:
        max-size: "50m"
        max-file: "10"

networks:
  ngc-network:
    external: true

volumes:
  model-cache:
    driver: local
  ${model_type}-logs:
    driver: local
  ${model_type}-data:
    driver: local
EOF
    
    # Create systemd service file
    cat > "$BUILD_DIR/manifests/${model_type}.service" << EOF
[Unit]
Description=NGC ${model_type} Container Service
After=docker.service
Requires=docker.service
StartLimitIntervalSec=0

[Service]
Type=simple
Restart=always
RestartSec=30
User=root
ExecStartPre=/bin/bash -c 'docker network create ngc-network || true'
ExecStart=/usr/bin/docker-compose -f ${BUILD_DIR}/manifests/${model_type}-compose.yml up
ExecStop=/usr/bin/docker-compose -f ${BUILD_DIR}/manifests/${model_type}-compose.yml down
TimeoutStartSec=600
TimeoutStopSec=120

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
EOF
    
    log "âœ… Deployment manifests created for $model_type"
}

# Main build function
build_model_container() {
    local model_type="$1"
    
    log "Building NGC container for $model_type..."
    
    # Validate model type
    if [[ ! -v "MODEL_CONFIGS[$model_type]" ]]; then
        error_exit "Unknown model type: $model_type. Available: ${!MODEL_CONFIGS[*]}"
    fi
    
    # Create build files
    create_model_config "$model_type"
    create_dockerfile "$model_type"
    
    # Build container
    build_container "$model_type"
    
    # Test container
    if ! test_container "$model_type"; then
        error_exit "Container test failed for $model_type"
    fi
    
    # Create deployment files
    create_deployment_manifests "$model_type"
    
    log "âœ… NGC container build completed for $model_type"
}

# Function to build all containers
build_all_containers() {
    log "Building all NGC containers..."
    
    for model_type in "${!MODEL_CONFIGS[@]}"; do
        log "Starting build for $model_type..."
        build_model_container "$model_type"
        log "Completed build for $model_type"
        echo ""
    done
    
    log "âœ… All NGC containers built successfully"
}

# Function to show usage
show_usage() {
    echo "Usage: $0 [model_type|all]"
    echo ""
    echo "Available model types:"
    for model_type in "${!MODEL_CONFIGS[@]}"; do
        echo "  $model_type - ${MODEL_CONFIGS[$model_type]}"
    done
    echo "  all - Build all model containers"
    echo ""
    echo "Examples:"
    echo "  $0 qwen3-moe     # Build only Qwen3-MOE container"
    echo "  $0 qwen3-42b     # Build only Qwen3-42B container"
    echo "  $0 all           # Build all containers"
}

# Main execution
main() {
    local model_type="${1:-}"
    
    if [[ -z "$model_type" ]]; then
        show_usage
        exit 1
    fi
    
    log "NGC Container Builder started"
    
    check_prerequisites
    
    case "$model_type" in
        "all")
            build_all_containers
            ;;
        *)
            build_model_container "$model_type"
            ;;
    esac
    
    # Display summary
    echo ""
    echo "ğŸ‰ NGC CONTAINER BUILD COMPLETE!"
    echo "==============================="
    echo ""
    echo "Built containers:"
    docker images --filter "reference=ngc-qwen3-*" --format "table {{.Repository}}\t{{.Tag}}\t{{.Size}}\t{{.CreatedAt}}"
    echo ""
    echo "ğŸ“‹ DEPLOYMENT OPTIONS:"
    echo "1. Docker Compose: docker-compose -f $BUILD_DIR/manifests/MODEL-compose.yml up -d"
    echo "2. Direct Docker: docker run --gpus all -p 8000:8000 ngc-qwen3-MODEL:latest"
    echo "3. Systemd Service: Install service files from $BUILD_DIR/manifests/"
    echo ""
    echo "ğŸ“ Build artifacts:"
    echo "  â€¢ Dockerfiles: $BUILD_DIR/Dockerfile.*"
    echo "  â€¢ Configurations: $BUILD_DIR/configs/"
    echo "  â€¢ Manifests: $BUILD_DIR/manifests/"
    echo "  â€¢ Build logs: $LOG_FILE"
    echo ""
    echo "âœ… Ready for production deployment!"
}

# Script execution
if [[ "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}" == "${0}" ]]; then
    main "$@"
fi
